query:
UPDATE task_template
SET
    final_task_template_arg_id = (
        SELECT COALESCE(
            (
                SELECT
                    final_task_template_arg_id
                FROM task_template_arg
                WHERE id = ?1
            ),
            MAX(id), 0
        )
        FROM task_template_arg
        WHERE task_template_id = ?1
    )
WHERE id = ?1
RETURNING final_task_template_arg_id
